item.title: Packing, encrypting and uploading deliverables
item.description: Intro Sometimes when I do client work, I don’t have time to set up Git repositories, and both me and the client know what we’re building. When the work is done, I generate the invoice based on the time spent on the project, and I have to ship the deliverables. In my case, I sometimes work on a C# project on Windows10 laptop where I happen to have a WSL installed.
